class.name: agent.ontology.classes.ResourceNode
class.description: Represents a resource network node. A node is part of a distribution network. it can consume and produce resources. A resource network node can be enabled and disabled by simulated units. A resource network node can be supplied with resources from another node or by a supply plot.

method.name: enableIt
method.description: Must be called on a system that requires activation in order to be used.

method.name: disableIt
method.description: Stops a system from being activated. A deactivated system can't be used.

method.name: operateIt
method.description: To manage and run this element in order to activate it. Operating a 'system' object is a permanent effect. The object is activated until tthe the agent is operating it.

method.name: canBeOperated
method.description:
Returns 'true' if this entity can be operated by the agent, 'false' otherwise.
This implementation returns 'false'.

method.name: canBeDisabled
method.description:
Returns 'true' if this entity can be disabled by the agent.
This implementation returns 'true' because enabled a ressource node is a magic action.

method.name: canBeEnabled
method.description:
Returns 'true' if this entity can be enabled by the agent.
This implementation returns 'true' because disabled a ressource node is a magic action.
